Article Title: Google is shutting down this four year old service in June this year
Article Text:
Google One users in India need not worry

How to remove VPN by Google One from your device

Open Finder.

Click Applications in the sidebar.

Drag "VPN by Google One" to the Trash.

Right-click on "VPN by Google One."

Select Move to Trash.

If you're asked for a username and password, enter the credentials of an administrator account on your Mac. This can be the name and password you use to log in to your Mac

Google previously said that it will shut down the Google One VPN service. The tech giant has now announced a date for the same. Google One VPN service will stop working from June 20, 2024.Google introduced the VPN by Google One in October 2020.“Starting June 20, 2024, VPN by Google One will be discontinued,” Google says on a support page. The company also lists steps explaining how users can remove Google One VPN from their device.Google states that Pixel 8 and newer devices offer a built-in VPN as part of their system settings.After VPN by Google One is removed from the Google One app, Pixel 7 users will still be able to continue using VPN functionality when they update their system software. The company will release a system update on June 3, 2024 to enable VPN by Google, a built-in VPN, for Pixel 7, 7 Pro, 7a, and Fold.Google One users in India don’t need to worry as the company never introduced its VPN service in the country in the first place.
Article Summary: Google One VPN service will stop working from June 20, 2024. Google introduced the VPN by Google One in October 2020. Google states that Pixel 8 and newer devices offer a built-in VPN as part of their system settings. Pixel 7 users will still be able to continue using VPN functionality when they update their system software.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Gemini Nano AI model brings "Help Me Write" feature to Chrome
Article Text:
A gradual rollout awaits

Google Chrome is all set to get Gemini Nano integration. Announced at Google I/O, Gemini Nano will first be used to supercharge the " Help Me Write " feature, offering users real-time writing assistance directly within the Chrome browser.For those unaware, "Help Me Write" debuted earlier this year, offering basic assistance with drafting emails, social media posts, and other text formats.Now, with Gemini Nano on board, users can expect a more refined and efficient experience. The AI model will analyze your writing in real-time, suggesting improvements, generating creative text formats, and overall streamlining the writing process.A key advantage of Gemini Nano is its ability to run locally on your device. Unlike some cloud-based AI solutions, this ensures your writing prompts and data remain private. Processing happens directly on your computer, eliminating concerns about information being sent to external servers.The integration of Gemini Nano with "Help Me Write" is expected to begin with Chrome version 126, currently available in the Canary channel. A wider rollout for all users is likely to follow in the coming months. This phased approach allows Google to gather feedback and ensure a smooth transition for Chrome users.While "Help Me Write" is the initial focus, the possibilities extend far beyond. Developers will soon have access to Gemini Nano through high-level APIs, allowing them to integrate features like translation, captioning, and transcription into their web applications.
Article Summary: Google Chrome is set to get Gemini Nano integration. Gemini Nano will first be used to supercharge the " Help Me Write " feature. The AI model will analyze your writing in real-time, suggesting improvements. Developers will soon have access to Gemini Nano through high-level APIs.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Android to get smarter with on-device multimodal Gemini Nano and a new kind of assistant
Article Text:
Google's I/O showcased AI updates for Android with the Gemini app. This context-aware assistant replaces Google Assistant and offers features like the 'Ask this video' and 'Ask this PDF' buttons. The Gemini Nano model, with Multimodality, will enhance on-device AI capabilities beyond text input.

Gemini Nano is going multimodal

Gemini app will be more context-aware

Using AI to make Android more accessible to visually challenged

AI to help you detect spam calls

Circle to Search will now help students with homework, too

Google’s I/O this year was all about AI, whether it be search, workspace, or every other app and service of the company is getting lofty of AI features, so how could Android miss out on all the fun? If you have been running Android, it is going to get smarter with the Gemini Nano model, and the Gemini app , what the company calls “a new kind of assistant.” Google says that these updates should change the way people interact with their phones.So, let’s have a look at what’s new with Android, shall we?Android's built-in AI model, Gemini Nano, is also receiving a significant upgrade. The next major update, Gemini Nano with Multimodality, will expand the on-device model's capabilities beyond text input, allowing it to process sights, sounds, and spoken language. The multimodal capabilities should arrive later this year on Pixel phones.Gemini Nano will power new features such as Dynamic Suggestions, which will provide users with relevant suggestions based on the content displayed on their screen.The Gemini app, which is replacing Google Assistant on Android, is set to become more context-aware and integrated with other Google apps. Users will soon be able to access the Gemini overlay while using other apps, allowing them to seamlessly use AI features without switching between apps.If you watch a lot of YouTube, then there’s a new “Ask this video” button, which will bring up the Gemini overlay and help you with questions relevant to the video. There’s also an "Ask this PDF" feature, which will be introduced for Gemini Advanced subscribers. As the name implies, the feature will let users get answers from documents without having to go through all the pages.With Gemini, users could not only create AI-generated images but also drag and drop them into Gmail, Google Messages, and other apps.Additionally, Gemini Nano will enhance the TalkBack feature, generating rich descriptions for unlabeled images without requiring an internet connection. This improvement will make Android devices more accessible to users with visual impairments.Google is leveraging Gemini Nano to introduce a new scam detection feature to analyse real-time phone conversations. The AI will alert users if it detects patterns commonly associated with scams, such as requests for personal information or urgent fund transfers. This opt-in feature will operate entirely on-device, ensuring user privacy.Google's Circle to Search feature, which allows users to search for anything on their phone using a simple gesture, has been updated to assist students with homework. Starting today, students can circle a physics or maths problem they're struggling with, and Circle to Search will provide step-by-step instructions to solve it without the need to leave the current app.Later this year, Google's LearnLM initiative will power the feature, which will expand to handle more complex problems involving formulas, diagrams, and graphs.The updated Gemini app , the multimodal Gemini Nano model, and the other features will be rolled out to supported Android phones, which Google says are around hundreds of millions, over the next few months.
Article Summary: Gemini app will be more context-aware and integrated with other Google apps. Users will soon be able to access the Gemini overlay while using other apps, allowing them to seamlessly use AI features without switching between apps. Gemini Nano will power new features such as Dynamic Suggestions, which will provide users with relevant suggestions based on the content displayed on their screen.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Google’s Gemini AI will soon detect spam calls on Android phones
Article Text: Google is putting its artificial intelligence at work to detect and warn users about potential phone scams in real time. The feature will be built into a future version of the Android operating system. It should come out later this year with the upcoming Android 15.The feature uses Gemini Nano , the smallest version of Google's Generative AI that runs entirely on the user's device, ensuring privacy.The AI analyses conversation patterns often associated with scams and alerts users if they suspect they are talking to a scammer.The AI will look for red flags, such as callers pretending to be bank representatives asking for sensitive information like passwords or PINs, requesting gift card payments, or pressuring users to transfer money immediately. When the AI detects these suspicious patterns, it will show a notification on the user's device, allowing them to decide whether to continue or end the call.While the feature could help protect many users from falling for scams, its availability may be limited at first. Considering that Gemini Nano only works on the Google Pixel 8 Pro and Samsung S24 series, the feature should remain limited to these phones and the others getting support in the future.Google says that users will have to choose to turn on the scam detection feature, so the users won’t have to worry much about the AI listening to their calls.The company is still testing this feature and will have more to tell us later this summer, most probably when the Android 15 nears the stable rollout.
Article Summary: The feature will be built into a future version of the Android operating system. It should come out later this year with the upcoming Android 15. The feature uses Gemini Nano, the smallest version of Google's Generative AI that runs entirely on the user's device, ensuring privacy.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Google Search gets 'personalised' Gemini model, what this means
Article Text:
Google Search

can now research, plan and brainstorm on users’ behalf with

generative AI

, the company said at its annual Google I/O 2024 conference. Google is infusing a custom

Gemini

AI model that will bring together Gemini’s capabilities — including multi-step reasoning, planning and multimodality — to its Search systems.

AI Overviews provides quick summaries and relevant links

Search is now offering AI Overviews, a feature that automatically generates concise summaries of topics directly within search results.

This eliminates the need to gather information from multiple sources. AI Overviews will be rolled out to all users in the US this week, ultimately reaching over a billion users globally by year-end.

Google

says that links presented within AI Overviews receive more clicks compared to traditional search results.

It also highlighted that ads will continue to be clearly labelled and displayed in dedicated sections.

Soon, users will have the option to customise their AI Overviews, including the ability to simplify the language or expand the details provided. On desktops, users will be able to choose from "Original," "Simpler," and "Break It Down" options within the AI Overview section.

AI summaries will understand complex questions

The AI Overview in Google Search will be able to handle complex questions with all specific needs and considerations in one go.

For example, when searching for a yoga studio, users can ask the Search to suggest a place that is popular with locals, have a convenient commute from their location, and offer a new member discount.

Also, it will soon assist users with planning, starting with meals and vacations. Search will soon categorise AI-generated results pages findings under creative AI-crafted headlines. This feature will initially launch for US users searching for dining and recipe inspiration (English searches).

Search with videos

Search is also getting advancements in video understanding for visual search. Users can point their smartphone camera at an object or action, and ask a question. Video search functionality will debut in US

Search Labs

(English queries) and expand to additional regions over time.
Article Summary: Google Search is now offering AI Overviews, a feature that automatically generates concise summaries of topics directly within search results. The feature will be rolled out to all users in the US this week, ultimately reaching over a billion users globally by year-end. Users will have the option to customise their AI overviews, including the ability to simplify the language.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Google has an answer to OpenAI’s Sora AI model
Article Text:
Google Veo AI-video generator: Availability



Google has launched its latest artificial intelligence (AI)-based text-to-video generator model, Veo , that will compete with OpenAI’s Sora . The tech giant claims that the new video generation model can create high-quality 1080p videos from text, images and video prompts. It can capture the details of a user’s instruction in different visual and cinematic styles.With this model, users can ask for videos like aerial shots of a landscape or a timelapse. Users can further edit their videos with additional prompts.Users will be able to access Google’s Veo model in the company’s new experimental tool called VideoFX . This tool will also allow users to explore other features like storyboarding and generating longer scenes.Veo builds upon the company’s multiple video-generating models including -- GQN, Phenaki, Walt, VideoPoet, Lumiere and more. The company claims that it has combined the best of these models to offer improved consistency, quality and output resolution with Veo.During the I/O 2024 event, the company also showed a video of the making of a short film by filmmaker Donald Glover using the Google Veo model.This video showed the filmmaking team using prompts of different shots for making the short film. This project was a collaboration between Google DeepMind , Donald Glover and Gilga.The company confirmed that some of these features will be available to select creators through VideoFX at labs.google over the coming week. The waitlist for the same is now open.
Article Summary: Google has launched its latest artificial intelligence (AI)-based text-to-video generator model, Veo. The tech giant claims that the new video generation model can create high-quality 1080p videos from text, images and video prompts. Veo builds upon the company’s multiple video-generating models including -- GQN, Phenaki, Walt and VideoPoet.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: Imagen-3 is Google’s answer to ChatGPT-maker OpenAI’s Dall-E 3
Article Text:
Google pauses image-generation in Gemini chatbot

Google launches Veo: Its text-to-video AI model

Google has announced Imagen-3 , an upgrade to its text-to-image creation model, at Google I/O 2024 . It will compete against ChatGPT-maker OpenAI 's Dall-E 3 model – a tool that is also being used to generate images in Microsoft’s Copilot.Google claims Imagen 3 produces the highest quality images yet from its systems. These images boast an impressive level of detail, achieving a photorealistic and lifelike quality with minimal artefacts or distorted images.Google highlights improvements in Imagen 3's text processing capabilities, allowing for better understanding of user instructions. Additionally, Imagen 3 is claimed to demonstrate increased proficiency in managing details extracted from complex or lengthy prompts.Earlier this year, Google paused the image generation capabilities in the Gemini AI chatbot after it generated factually incorrect images. Recently, Google CEO Sundar Pichai also said that the company is developing the feature from the ground up and fixing the issues.It is yet to be seen how good Imagen 3 is, especially when its performance in terms of handling text prompts and results is compared to competitor Dall-E 3.Apart from the updated text-to-image AI model, the company also announced Veo – a text-to-video AI model that can generate videos based on text prompts – just like OpenAI’s Sora.Veo can produce “high-quality” 1080p videos with “an advanced understanding of natural language and visual semantics.” The AI generated videos can last “beyond a minute” and the model is said to be capable of understanding cinematic and visual techniques, such as timelapse.Google has partnered with Donald Glover and Gilga, his creative studio, for the model's capabilities. Google is also working with artists like Wyclef Jean and Bjorn to test out its Music AI Sandbox – a bunch of tools that can help users produce songs and beats.
Article Summary: Google announces Imagen-3, an upgrade to its text-to-image creation model. Will compete against ChatGPT-maker OpenAI's Dall-E 3 model. Google also announces Veo – a text- to-video AI model that can generate videos based on text prompts.

Article Title: ChatGPT users are getting GPT-4'o' free: What are new features, availability and more
Article Text:
What is 'o' in GPT-4o

GPT-4o pricing and availability

GPT-4o's key capabilities

How GPT-4o is "more human than ever"

OpenAI has announced a significant update to its popular ChatGPT platform. This update introduces GPT-4o , a powerful new AI model that brings "GPT-4-class chat" to the app. Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati and OpenAI employees showcased their newest flagship model, capable of real-time verbal conversations with a friendly AI chatbot that can speak like a human.OpenAI’s announcement comes just a day before the Google's annual developers conference -- Google I/O.“GPT-4o provides GPT-4 level intelligence but is much faster,” Murati said on stage. “We think GPT-4o is really shifting that paradigm into the future of collaboration, where this interaction becomes much more natural and far easier.”In GPT-4o — the "o" stands for omni -- combines voice, text and vision into a single model, allowing it to be faster than its predecessor. The company said that the new model is two times faster and significantly more efficient.OpenAI CTO Mira Murati said in a livestream announcement on Monday. It’ll be free for all users, and paid users will continue to “have up to five times the capacity limits” of free users, Murati added at the launch event in San Francisco. The update brings a number of features to free users that so far have been limited to those with a paid subscription to ChatGPT. These include the ability to search the web for answers to queries, speak to the chatbot and hear responses in various voices, and command it to store details that the chatbot can recall in the future. OpenAI is beginning to roll out GPT-4o’s new text and image capabilities to some paying ChatGPT Plus and Team users today, and is offering those capabilities to enterprise users soon. The company will make the new version of its “voice mode” assistant available to ChatGPT Plus users in the coming weeks.GPT-4o goes beyond traditional text-based communication and can now "see" the world around it through vision capabilities. These capabilities include:* Desktop screenshots: GPT-4o can analyse screenshots taken directly on your Mac.* Mobile app integration: An iPhone app (with a Windows app coming soon) allows uploading videos and screenshots for GPT-4o to process.The OpenAI demo mainly featured the company's employees asking questions to the voiced ChatGPT, which responded with jokes and human-like banter.* Real-time interaction: Unlike previous models, GPT-4o allows for back-and-forth conversation without waiting for the model to finish its statement.* Harmonised speech synthesis: GPT-4o can generate different voices and even harmonise them for a more natural dialogue experience.* Sophisticated conversations: GPT-4o offers "normal" conversational interactions, translations, and more, all with the sophistication expected from GPT-4 level technology.
Article Summary: GPT-4o combines voice, text and vision into a single model. The company said that the new model is two times faster and significantly more efficient. The update brings a number of features to free users that so far have been limited to those with a paid subscription to ChatGPT.

Article Title: Google I/O 2024: AI, Android 15 and possibly more Pixel phones
Article Text:
Google’s I/O keynote is going to be mostly about AI,

Gemini

, and even more AI

A sneak peek into

Android 15

More

Pixel phones

, maybe?

Expanding the Google ecosystem

What's in for the developers

Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O 2024 , will kick off on May 14 with a keynote address that promises to showcase the tech giant's latest advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), Android updates, and some new hardware.Building upon last year's AI-centric event, Google is expected to double down on its AI initiatives, focusing strongly on its Gemini platform.Gemini, Google's answer to OpenAI's ChatGPT , will likely take centre stage as the company demonstrates new features and capabilities that could further enhance the AI chatbot we know today.While AI steals the spotlight, Google won't forget its roots in mobile technology. Attendees can expect a deep dive into Android 15, the latest version of Google's mobile operating system. With the first Android 15 beta already in the hands of developers, Google is poised to unveil a host of new user-facing features designed to enhance productivity, privacy, and security. Android 15 promises to deliver a more polished and efficient mobile experience, from improved notification management to a more refined user interface.Although Google I/O is primarily a software-focused event, the company has been known to surprise audiences with hardware announcements in the past. This year, the Pixel 8a has already been unveiled ahead of the conference, but that doesn't mean Google is out of tricks. Whispers of a potential Pixel Fold 2 or even a teaser for the upcoming Pixel 9 series have been circulating, leaving tech enthusiasts eager to see what Google has up its sleeve.We might also see some new Nest hardware make it to the main stage. A new chromecast, possibly a ‘Pro’ one.In addition to the headline-grabbing announcements, Google I/O 2024 is expected to showcase updates and improvements across the company's vast ecosystem of products and services. From enhancements to Google Maps and Google Workspace to advancements in WearOS and smart home technology - we could hear about the new upgrades coming to them. But, at the end of the day, it’s going to be all about AI.The keynote is what most normal people focus on, but the I/O is a developer galore. Developers can look forward to a wealth of sessions, workshops, and resources designed to help them leverage the latest technologies and best practices in their projects. Whether it's harnessing the power of AI, optimising for Android 15, or integrating with Google's ever-expanding suite of tools, developers are in for new technologies to play with.With AI poised to take centre stage and Android 15 promising a new era of mobile innovation, Google seems ready to set the tone for the coming year at the I/O 2024.
Article Summary: Google's annual developer conference, Google I/O 2024, will kick off on May 14. The keynote address will showcase the tech giant's latest advancements in artificial intelligence (AI), Android updates, and some new hardware. Building upon last year's AI-centric event, Google is expected to double down on its Gemini platform.

Article Title: Why Zomato has written down this Rs 39 crore investment
Article Text:
What Zomato said on exiting payment aggregator business

Food delivery platforms Zomato has announced that it's abandoning its plans to enter the payments space. In a recent stock exchange filing, the company said it's surrendering its payment aggregator (PA) license obtained from the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) in January 2024.The Gurgaon-headquartered startup Zomato also withdrew its application for a mobile wallet license.This decision resulted in a write-down of Rs 39 crore invested in its payments subsidiary, Zomato Payments. “The payments landscape in India has evolved meaningfully over the past couple of years since the time we applied for these licences,” the company said in its exchange filings. “At Zomato, we do not see ourselves having a significant competitive advantage against the incumbents in the payments space and hence we don’t foresee a business in payments space as commercially viable for us, at this stage.”The move comes as a surprise considering Zomato just received the PA license a few months ago. The company cited a more competitive landscape and a lack of foreseen commercial advantage as reasons for the exit. Zomato believes established players already have a strong foothold in the payments market.Zomato further explained that the challenges of entering the payments business became clearer as they planned operational structures. This decision coincides with the RBI proposing stricter KYC norms for payment aggregators.Zomato was one of the few new entrants seeking a PA license, unlike most existing players who secured final approval. With established companies like Razorpay and Cashfree dominating the market, Zomato felt it wouldn't be commercially viable to compete.
Article Summary: Zomato has announced that it's abandoning its plans to enter the payments space. The company cited a more competitive landscape and a lack of foreseen commercial advantage as reasons for the exit. Zomato was one of the few new entrants seeking a PA license, unlike most existing players who secured final approval.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 15 deal: How to buy it at Rs 42,900
Article Text:
How to buy Apple iPhone 15 for Rs 42,900

Apple iPhone 15 is up for grabs with exciting offers and discounts on India iStore. So much so that you can buy the device for as low as Rs 42,900 (base variant). India iStore is running an Upgrader Fest from May 10 to May 26 that offers exchange discounts and bank discounts on purchase of Apple iPhone 15 series. If you have been looking to upgrade your old iPhone to the latest iPhone, then now is the time.Apple iPhone 15 carries a price tag of Rs 79,900 for the 128GB variant. As part of the ongoing offer, India iStore is giving an instant store discount of Rs 5,000 which brings down the price to Rs 74,900. Additionally, there is an instant cashback of Rs 4,000 on credit cards of ICICI Bank and SBI.Further, there is a discount of Rs 20,000 if you exchange your old iPhone while purchasing the new iPhone 15. Do note that the said Rs 20,000 discount is calculated on exchange value of the 64GB model of iPhone 12. India iStore is also giving an exchange bonus of Rs 8,000.All these discounts cumulatively bring down the effective price of iPhone 15 to Rs 42,900.As mentioned above, the website is also giving discounts on other iPhone 15 series - iPhone 15 Plus, iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. You can purchase the iPhone 15 Plus at an effective price of Rs 52,900 during the fest. Apple iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max, on the other hand, can be purchased at an effective price of Rs 1,03,900 and Rs 1,28,900, respectively.In addition, there is an offer of up to Rs 14,000 on Apple iPhone 13.
Article Summary: Apple iPhone 15 carries a price tag of Rs 79,900 for the 128GB variant. India iStore is running an Upgrader Fest from May 10 to May 26. There is an instant cashback of Rs 4,000 on credit cards of ICICI Bank and SBI.

Article Title: 30 free Poki Games online you need to play right now; explore the list
Article Text:
Free Poki Games online to play anytime, anywhere

Subway Surfers

Gameplay instructions

Use the Arrow Up key to make Jake jump over obstacles.

Press Arrow Down to make Jake duck down and slide under barriers.

Use the left and right arrow keys to shift Jake's position sideways.

Activate the hoverboard by pressing the Space key, granting temporary immunity from collisions.

Aim to run for as long as possible while collecting coins and power-ups to achieve higher scores and unlock rewards.

Candy Crush Saga

Gameplay instructions

Click and hold on a candy using your mouse or trackpad cursor.

Drag the candy in any direction (up, down, left, or right) to swap it with an adjacent candy.

Aim to create matches of three or more candies of the same color either horizontally or vertically on the game board. This will help you progress through the levels efficiently.

Angry Birds

How to play

Press and hold the cursor to control the slingshot.

Pull the slingshot back in the desired direction and to the desired extent to aim the bird towards the pigs. As you adjust the slingshot, a dotted line will appear to indicate the trajectory the bird will follow once released.

Super Mario and Sonic

How to play

Use the Arrow Up key to jump.

Use the Arrow Left and Right keys to move in the corresponding directions.

Be cautious not to fall into pits or collide with turtles as you navigate through the levels. Take your time and plan your moves carefully.

Master Chess

How to play

Click on the chess piece you wish to move.

Then, click on the square where you want to place the selected piece. Remember to follow the standard rules of chess; you cannot move pieces arbitrarily but must adhere to the established rules of the game.

Moto X3M

How to play

Use the Arrow Up key to accelerate and the Arrow Down key to brake.

Press the right arrow to lean forward and the left arrow to lean backward.

Maintain control of your speed to execute stunts successfully without crashing or falling off the bike.

2048

How to play

Use the arrow keys to slide matching tiles together, which will also shift other tiles on the board.

Think ahead and strategize to visualise how the board will appear after each move. This foresight is key to achieving success in the game.

Pool Club

How to play

Use the trackpad or mouse to select the direction in which you want to strike.

Click and drag the cue stick to adjust the power of your shot.

Release the cursor to execute the shot and strike the cue ball.

Keep an eye on the countdown timer and strategize your shots accordingly to maximise your chances of pocketing balls within the time limit.

Temple Run

How to play

Use the Arrow Up key to jump over obstacles, catch ropeways, and leap over gaps.

Use the Arrow Down key to duck under hindrances on the path.

Keep running to collect coins and power-ups to enhance your performance as you progress.

Tennis Masters

How to pla

Use the X key to hit the ball or the Z key to perform a smash shot.

Control your player's movement using the W key to jump, A key to move backward, and D key to move forward.

Football Legends

How to play

Use the X key to hit the ball.

Use the Z key to execute a super shot.

Jump by pressing the W key.

Move forward with the D key and backward with the A key to control your player's positioning on the field.

Super Tunnel Rush

How to play

Use the A/D keys or Arrow Left/Right keys to manoeuvre your car left or right.

Navigate carefully to dodge obstacles and stay on track as you race through the cyberpunk world.

Trivia

Classic Mode : Spin the wheel and let fate decide the topic of your quiz. It's a random selection each time.

: Spin the wheel and let fate decide the topic of your quiz. It's a random selection each time. Challenge Mode : Pick the topic you want to tackle and answer all questions without error.

: Pick the topic you want to tackle and answer all questions without error. Party Mode: Engage in competitive gameplay with others, adding a fun and social element to the quiz experience.

How to play

Use the trackpad or mouse to spin the wheel and select a topic, or directly choose the topic you want to quiz yourself on.

Answer questions by selecting the correct options presented.

Bubble Shooter

How to play

Use the cursor to adjust your aim and ensure it's accurate.

Click the trackpad or mouse to shoot a bubble.

Continue playing until all bubbles are burst. Prevent the bubbles from getting too close to the bubble shooter to maintain control of the game.

Stickman Hook

How to play

Press the spacebar to catch onto and release from the hook.

If you fall, use the spacebar strategically to swing back into action. Time your swings carefully to navigate in the right direction and at the correct speed to reach the finish line.

Vectaria.io

How to play

Use the WASD keys or arrow keys to move your character.

Click the right mouse button or trackpad to place a block.

Use the left mouse button to hit and mine blocks.

Press the spacebar to jump.

Open your inventory by pressing X or U.

Access the home menu by pressing G.

View spawn points with the M key.

Open the shop menu by pressing O.

Access the guide by pressing I.

Press Enter to start chatting and type your message.

Jetpack Joyride

How to play

Press the spacebar to ascend using your jetpack.

Release the spacebar to descend back down.

Combat Reloaded 2

How to play

Use the WASD keys to move: W to move forward, S to move backward, A to move left, and D to move right.

Press the spacebar to jump.

Use the mouse or touchpad to aim your weapon.

Click the mouse or touchpad to shoot.

Press the 1-9 keys to switch between weapons during gameplay.

Fruit Ninja

How to play

Use the mouse to press and move it over the fruits for slicing.

If using a touchpad, press with one finger while using another finger to slice through the fruits.

Mekorama

How to play

Use the mouse to click and drag, or use the touchpad to change the camera angle and view different parts of the island.

Click on blocks or sections of land on the island to move the robot to that location. This allows you to navigate and solve puzzles effectively.

Golf champions

How to play

Press and swipe back on the touchpad to drag the ball and release it to shoot towards the cup. This action allows you to control the direction and force of your shot.

Ludo Hero

How to play

Click on the dice to roll it and move your pawn the corresponding number of steps.

Wait for the other player's turn to continue the game.

Monkey Mart

How to play

Use the WASD keys to navigate around the mart.

Collect bananas and other products, and place them on the sales stall.

Receive payments from customers at the cash counter.

Train staff members and manage various aspects of the mart to grow your business successfully.

Tetra Blocks

How to play

Use the W key or Arrow Up key to rotate and position the falling blocks to fill rows effectively.

Press A to move the blocks left and D to move them right to align them correctly.

Use the S key or Arrow Down key to accelerate the speed of the falling blocks.

Press the spacebar to instantly drop the blocks into place for faster gameplay.

Breakoid

How to play

Adjust the position of the paddle and click the mouse or touchpad to release the ball.

Use the touchpad swipe or mouse to move the paddle below to bounce the ball back up when it hits the blocks.

Move the paddle left or right to control the direction of the ball or increase its speed and force during the game.

Sword Masters

How to play

Use the WASD or arrow keys on your keyboard to move your character.

Use the mouse to adjust the camera and control the direction of movement.

Automatically attack enemies when you approach them in close proximity during gameplay.

Blumgi Soccer

How to play

Use the mouse or touchpad to select the direction or angle for your shot.

Click and hold the left mouse button to aim.

Release the button to shoot the ball toward the goalpost.

Hills of Steel

How to play

Use the A and D keys or arrow keys to move the tank forward and backward.

Use the mouse or spacebar to shoot or attack enemies. Ensure accurate aiming to hit your targets.

Press the B button to repair the tank when needed, keeping it in optimal condition during battles.

Tribals IO

How to play

Use the WASD keys to move your character around the island.

Press the spacebar to jump.

Use the left mouse button to attack enemies or animals.

Right-click the mouse to open the build menu for constructing structures.

Press the tab button to access your inventory.

Communicate with others by typing messages with the Enter button or using voice chat with the T button.

Level Devil

How to play

Use the WASD keys to run and manoeuvre your character.

Press the spacebar to jump over holes and obstacles as you navigate towards the door.

Poki Games is a popular online gaming platform that boasts a staggering monthly player base of over 50 million individuals. This website hosts an extensive collection of games, ranging from timeless classics to contemporary favourites like Subway Surfer, Temple Run, and Candy Crush Saga. Whether you're seeking a quick diversion or immersive entertainment, Poki Games offers a diverse selection of titles suitable for play on any device, whether it's a smartphone, laptop, or PC.If you're looking to engage in casual gaming experiences that can be enjoyed effortlessly through your preferred device, Poki Games stands out as an accessible and entertaining destination.With its broad spectrum of offerings, there's something here for everyone, making it an ideal choice for those seeking to unwind and have fun online.Subway Surfers is a popular endless runner game designed initially for mobile phones, optimised for portrait screens. Within the game, players assume the role of Jake, the default character, and embark on an exhilarating escape from a pursuing police officer and his dog. The objective is to navigate through a vibrant urban landscape while avoiding oncoming trains, trams, and various obstacles that obstruct your path. Along the way, players have the opportunity to collect coins, power-ups, and special gears to enhance their gameplay experience.Candy Crush Saga is a widely popular tile-matching puzzle game that has captured the attention of both younger players and adults alike. The objective of the game is to match candies of the same colour to clear them from the board and progress through levels.Angry Birds was a highly successful game that even inspired its own movie based on its beloved characters. In this game, players take control of various birds, notably the red angry bird, with the mission of protecting their eggs from green-coloured pigs. The objective is to launch these birds from a slingshot towards the pigs to stop them from devouring the eggs.To play, use your mouse or touchpad cursor:While the original Super Mario game wasn't available on Poki, we discovered a similar clone titled "Super Mario and Sonic" on Poki.co.in. This game allows you to play as either Super Mario or Sonic, both featuring gameplay mechanics inspired by the Mario series. Your objective is to run, jump, and attack enemies while collecting coins, aiming to reach the flagpole at the end of each level.Chess is a widely recognized game, and I chose this version for its appealing graphics. You have the option to play against another player or challenge the CPU. Each player is allotted 10 seconds to make a move, adding intensity to the gameplay.In this game, you'll ride a bike, manage its speed, and perform daring stunts to reach the finish line. The game is reminiscent of Bike Race Pro, available on Android and iOS platforms.This game is a puzzle challenge where you slide tiles with matching numbers to combine them and create new tiles, earning points in the process. The goal is to continue this strategy until you reach the elusive 2048 tile.Among various pool games I've tried, I particularly enjoy the single-player mode of this game. Here, you challenge yourself against the clock rather than competing against another player. The objective is to pocket all the balls before the timer runs out, with a total of 60 seconds given. Additionally, sinking balls into the pockets grants you time bonuses, extending your gameplay.Here's a description of another popular endless racing game where you take on the role of an explorer sprinting with a valuable relic. Your goal is to continuously run, collecting coins and power-ups, while navigating around obstacles and avoiding pursuit by monkeys. It's essential to stay on the path and avoid falling off.In this game, your objective is to strike the ball back and forth over the net. The game concludes when a player fails to return the ball or hits it out of bounds.y:In this game, your objective is to score goals by hitting the ball with your head or legs. Positioning and timing are crucial to make successful shots while ensuring your goal remains protected from the opponent.Experience a car racing game set in a cyberpunk environment featuring physics-defying stunts. Keep your vehicle accelerating while maintaining control to avoid falling off the track and colliding with obstacles. Collect green power-ups to increase your speed along the way.Put your knowledge to the test with this game offering three exciting modes:In this game, your goal is to aim and shoot bubbles at groups of the same coloured bubbles to make them burst and clear the screen.In this game, your objective is to use a hook to propel yourself across the finish line by adjusting your angle, speed, and direction effectively.This game is reminiscent of Minecraft, where you gather and collect items to construct various objects.In this game, you'll navigate using a jetpack to shoot down enemy scientists, avoid obstacles, and gather points in an endless race. Along the way, you'll encounter giant mechanical dragons, birds, powerful weapons, stylish outfits, and other surprises.This is a first-person shooter game where you eliminate enemies while avoiding being killed by opponents. Strategically aim, shoot, and take cover as needed. You'll be part of a team within a 10-member server room, and you can also engage in Deathmatch and other game modes.In this game, your task is to swiftly swipe and slice fruits before they hit the ground. Aim accurately and avoid hitting any bombs that may pass by. Exercise precision similar to that of a ninja as you slice various fruits like pears, apples, jackfruit, coconuts, and bananas. The goal is to never miss a fruit and definitely avoid hitting any bombs.In this game, you control a small robot stranded on a tiny island. Your objective is to solve puzzle blocks to create paths to reach the stars scattered across different areas of the island. Gather all the stars to advance to the next round and explore new maps.In this game, your goal is to aim and release the golf ball into the cup. Adjust the direction and speed of the ball to guide it closer to the cup while avoiding obstacles and staying within the course boundaries.Roll the dice and navigate your pawn around the board in this nostalgic journey through Ludo Hero. Relive the joy of playing this classic board game with family and friends, now available online. Enjoy either single-player mode against a bot or challenge an online player in multiplayer mode.In this game, you take on the role of a monkey managing a banana mart. Your tasks include setting up the farm, stalls, and cash counter, harvesting bananas, stocking the stall for sales, and handling customer transactions. As you progress, you'll expand your business with new workstations, staff members, and products. You can also train your staff to improve efficiency and ensure smooth operations.Experience the classic arcade game brought back with all its timeless fun. Your objective is to strategically arrange falling blocks to completely fill rows. Once a row is completely filled, it will clear, earning you points. The game's vibrant neon colours add to its special appeal.Explore another classic game where you use a paddle to bounce a ball and break blocks. Your goal is to control the paddle to keep the ball in play, breaking blocks along the way and collecting power-ups.Sword Masters is an engaging online adventure game where your character's mission is to defend the village by defeating enemies. Begin with just your bare hands, but soon acquire swords, gear, and coins. Along the way, encounter eggs that hatch into pets to aid you. Each battle earns you experience points, with the ultimate goal of becoming the most skilled warrior.Blumgi Soccer is a captivating and easy-to-play arcade football game where your objective is to shoot the ball into the goalpost. Navigate through obstacles and avoid pitfalls while ensuring the ball doesn't bounce back and hit you, which could push you into a rift.In this game, you control a tank and engage in battles against enemies while also maintaining balance to prevent the tank from toppling over. As you progress and level up, you can unlock various upgrades including tanks, mechs, robots, mines, force shields, and rocket strikes.Tribals offers a high-definition survival experience similar to Minecraft. Begin by waking up on an island where you must gather plants, chop down trees for wood, and use these resources to construct a base. Craft tools, hunt and cook chicken, and be prepared to fend off bear attacks while exploring the island and striving to survive.In this game, your goal is to swiftly reach and enter a door while avoiding sudden holes that may appear, posing a danger of falling and losing the game. Stay alert and agile to jump over these holes, especially when dealing with multiple holes or expanding ones.
Article Summary: summarize: Free Poki Games online to play anytime, anywhere. Subway Surfers: Use the Arrow Up key to make Jake jump over obstacles. Chess: Follow the standard rules of chess; you cannot move pieces arbitrarily but must adhere to the established rules of the game.

Article Title: Top 5 walking apps that pay you for walking; explore the list
Article Text:
Best apps that help you earn for walking

StepSetGo

Fitbit

Sweatcoin

Achievement

Bitwalking

Runtopia

PK Rewards

Stepbet

Lifecoin

Winwalk

Best walking apps 2024: How points or coins work in these apps

Frequently asked questions (FAQ’s)

How much can you earn with walking reward apps?

Are there any costs associated with using walking reward apps?

Are there globally available apps that pay you for walking?

Can you use multiple walking reward apps simultaneously?

Also read

Walking not only helps maintain physical fitness and overall health but can also be a source of income! Several apps offer real monetary rewards for walking. These apps track your steps and compensate you with cryptocurrency, redeemable points, or even tangible products.Imagine earning extra money simply by walking to work or enjoying a leisurely stroll in the park! In this article, we delve into the top 9 apps that pay you for walking in 2024.We'll explore how these apps operate, the rewards they provide, and their advantages and disadvantages. Let's begin and discover how you can transform your daily steps into cash.Discover the best apps that pay you to walk and earn rewards, including Paytm cash, for your daily steps:StepSetGo is a popular Indian app that incentivizes users with coins for each step taken. These coins can be exchanged for products and services offered by the app’s partner brands. StepSetGo stands out with its interactive challenge feature, allowing users to compete with friends and family for added motivation.Fitbit is a well-known fitness tracker app that monitors steps, distance covered, and calories burned, complete with built-in GPS for outdoor activity tracking. Users can earn badges upon reaching specific milestones and participate in leaderboard competitions.The app syncs seamlessly with Fitbit devices and integrates with other health apps like MyFitnessPal. However, a potential drawback is the requirement of owning a Fitbit device to access all functionalities, which can be costly.Sweatcoin is a distinctive app that compensates users with Sweatcoins for engaging in outdoor walking or running. These Sweatcoins can be redeemed for a variety of products, services, or charitable donations.Moreover, Sweatcoin hosts a marketplace where users can shop using their accumulated Sweatcoins. One limitation is that Sweatcoin is limited to tracking outdoor activities and may not be as precise as other fitness apps.Achievement is a comprehensive health and wellness app that compensates users for engaging in healthy activities, such as walking, exercising, and meditating. It syncs with various fitness apps and offers points that can be exchanged for cash via PayPal or direct deposit.Additionally, users can participate in surveys and studies for extra points. However, accumulating enough points for redemption may require patience.Bitwalking is a distinct app that awards users with Bitwalking dollars (BW$) based on their walking activity. These BW$ can be exchanged for products and services available in the app's marketplace. Bitwalking also fosters social connections among users through its networking feature.A drawback of Bitwalking is its limited availability, as it is not accessible in all countries.Runtopia is an app that rewards users with points for completing walking and running challenges and achieving fitness milestones. These points can be exchanged for various products and services offered in the app’s marketplace.Moreover, Runtopia offers personalised training plans to assist users in reaching their fitness objectives. However, certain premium features may require a subscription to access.PK Rewards is an app designed for walking and running that incentivizes users with coins upon completing challenges and achieving set goals. These earned coins can be exchanged for various products and services offered within the app’s marketplace. The app fosters social engagement by enabling users to challenge friends to meet fitness milestones.However, it's important to note that PK Rewards is currently exclusive to users in China.Stepbet is a distinctive fitness app that rewards users with cash for accomplishing their fitness objectives. Users participate by placing bets on themselves to meet specific goals, and successful achievers receive a portion of the collective pot. The app tailors personalised goals and challenges based on the individual's previous activity level.One drawback of Stepbet is the requirement for users to place upfront bets, which may not be suitable for everyone.Lifecoin is an innovative app that grants users Lifecoins upon completion of fitness challenges. These Lifecoins can subsequently be redeemed for various products and services accessible within the app's marketplace. Additionally, the app offers a donation feature where users can contribute Lifecoins to charity.Lifecoin synchronises with multiple fitness-tracking apps and includes a competitive leaderboard. However, it is limited in its ability to track specific activities like walking, running, and cycling, and may not provide as precise metrics as other fitness-tracking apps.Winwalk is a walking app that rewards users with coins for every step taken. These coins can be redeemed for products and services offered by the app's partner brands. Users can participate in challenges with friends and family to maintain motivation.Furthermore, Winwalk monitors calories burned and distance covered and features a leaderboard for friendly competition. Please be aware that Winwalk is currently accessible only in select countries.Apps that compensate you for walking use a blend of GPS technology and motion sensors to monitor your steps. Upon installing the app, you'll be prompted to set up an account and grant permission for the app to access your device's sensors.Certain apps require you to carry your phone at all times to track steps, whereas others allow synchronisation with external devices like fitness trackers. Typically, these apps establish a daily step target that you must reach to earn rewards.Upon reaching your target, the app will credit your account with points or coins that can be redeemed for various rewards. Regarding rewards, the options vary across different apps. Some apps provide cryptocurrency rewards such as Bitcoin, while others offer redeemable points for purchasing products or services. Additionally, certain apps offer cash rewards that can be transferred to your PayPal account or Paytm wallet.The earnings potential from apps that pay you for walking varies depending on the specific app. Some apps provide rewards in the form of real money, while others offer gift cards, discounts, or products. Compensation rates may range from a few cents per mile to accumulating rewards over time for larger payouts.Most walking reward apps are free to download and use, although some may have premium features or subscription options that involve fees. It's essential to review the terms and conditions before using any app to understand potential charges. Additionally, certain apps may require connection to specific devices like fitness trackers or smartwatches, which could involve additional costs.Many walking reward apps are accessible worldwide, though some may have restrictions based on country or region. Prior to downloading an app, check the app store listings to confirm availability in your location. If an app isn't available in your region, consider exploring alternative options or reaching out to the app developer to request expansion into your area.Yes, you can use multiple walking reward apps concurrently to maximise your earnings and rewards. However, it's important to monitor your progress on each app to avoid duplicating steps or rewards. You can prioritise apps based on rewards offered or features that align best with your fitness objectives.
Article Summary: Discover the best apps that pay you to walk and earn rewards, including PayTM cash, for your daily steps. StepSetGo is a popular Indian app that incentivizes users with coins for each step taken.Sweatcoin is a distinctive app that compensates users with Sweatcoins for engaging in outdoor walking or running.

Article Title: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max: 4 new camera features Apple may add to iPhone 16 Pro models
Article Text:
Upgraded ultra-wide cameras



Tetra-prism lens for iPhone 16 Pro



Improved lens flare control



New Sony primary sensor for improved low-light photography



Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16 series later this year in September. The upcoming lineup may include four smartphone models -- the iPhone 16, the iPhone 16 Plus, the iPhone 16 Pro and the iPhone 16 Pro Max. The Pro variants in the upcoming iPhone lineup are rumoured to bring new features like larger displays, a dedicated Capture button and more.According to a recent report by 9to5Mac, the Cupertino-based tech giant is also expected to add multiple noticeable improvements to the camera hardware of the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max models. Here are four new camera upgrades that may arrive with iPhone 16 Pro smartphones:Rumours suggest the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max may get an upgraded 48MP Ultra Wide camera this year. This is expected to be a major improvement from the current 12 MP Ultra Wide camera in the iPhone 15 Pro models.This upgrade is expected to offer improved performance in various shooting scenarios, particularly in low-light conditions. Images captured with the new Ultra-Wide camera are likely to show greater details and enhanced colour accuracy. The higher resolution will also provide increased flexibility during editing and post-processing.Furthermore, the 48MP Ultra Wide camera in the iPhone 16 Pro may also lead to significant advancements in spatial video recording. This feature, which utilises both the Main and Ultra Wide lenses, may enable the iPhone 16 Pro to record spatial video in 4K resolution. To compare, the iPhone 15 Pro is limited to recording spatial video at 1080p resolution.The current iPhone 15 Pro Max features a new tetra-prism camera design which offers 5x optical zoom and 25x digital zoom capabilities. With the upcoming iPhone 16 lineup, Apple is reportedly planning to extend this upgraded tetra-prism camera to the smaller iPhone 16 Pro model as well. This means both the iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 16 Pro Max will offer at least 5x optical zoom and 25x digital zoom.Rumours also suggest that the iPhone 16 Pro Max might feature a “periscope ultra-long telephoto combination.” This technology could potentially enable optical zoom greater than 5x.A common issue faced by most iPhone users is capturing lens flare while shooting in bright lighting conditions. This results in unexpected artefacts and internal reflections showing on images. While this problem is prevalent across most cameras on the market, Apple is reportedly working on a solution for the iPhone 16 Pro.According to rumours, Apple is testing a new "atomic layer deposition" (ALD) lens coating technology for the iPhone 16 Pro models. This anti-reflective coating could be applied to the iPhone 16 Pro's camera lenses to reduce the impact of internal reflections.If this rumour is true, users can expect fewer unexpected artefacts in images captured with the iPhone 16 Pro, particularly in bright lighting scenarios.The iPhone 16 Pro is expected to feature a new main camera sensor from Sony, which is designed to improve low-light performance.As per the report, Sony's latest stacked sensor technology separates the photodiodes and pixel transistors (which are usually combined into a single layer). This separation will allow the photodiodes responsible for capturing light to be significantly larger within the same overall pixel size.Sony claims that this new sensor will capture twice as much light as existing camera sensors. The increased light capture and reduced noise are expected to offer improved photos for iPhone users in all conditions.However, it remains uncertain whether this next-generation Sony sensor will be utilised in both iPhone 16 Pro models. A tipster on the Chinese social media platform Weibo suggested that only the iPhone 16 Pro Max may feature this upgraded stacked camera sensor hardware.
Article Summary: Apple is expected to launch the iPhone 16 series later this year in September. The upcoming lineup may include four smartphone models. The Pro variants in the upcoming iPhone lineup are rumoured to bring new features like larger displays, a dedicated Capture button and more. The Cupertino-based tech giant is also expected to add multiple improvements to the camera hardware.

Article Title: Poco F6 smartphone to launch in India on May 23
Article Text: Poco is all set to launch its latest F-series smartphone in India. The Chinese smartphone maker has confirmed that it will launch the Poco F6 smartphone in the country on May 23.The smartphone maker took to X (formerly known as Twitter) to announce the launch of the smartphone. Poco posted an image of the upcoming smartphone on the platform along with a caption which reads, “God level performance for Real Coming your way on 23rd May, 4:30 PM IST only on #Flipkart Know more https://bit.ly/3WF3j3M #POCOF65G #GodModeOn #POCO #POCOIndia.”The upcoming Poco F6 smartphone is said to be powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset.The smartphone is expected to sport a 50MP rear camera.Poco F6 is said to come in golden and black colour options. The smartphone is said to come with a 6.67-inch OLED display with 1.5K screen resolution. Poco F6 is tipped to be backed by a 5000 mAh battery with 120W fast charging support.
Article Summary: Poco is set to launch its latest F-series smartphone in India on May 23. The smartphone maker took to X (formerly known as Twitter) to announce the launch of the smartphone. Poco F6 is said to be powered by an octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3.

Article Title: How fake iPhones, AirPods and other Apple products helped this courier service catch employees suspected of stealing from packages
Article Text:
How much these employees stole from UPS customers



How were they caught



US-based multinational shipping and courier service, United Parcel Service ( UPS ) has reportedly used fake iPhones , AirPods, and other Apple products to seize its employees who were allegedly stealing from customers instead of delivering their goods. According to the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office (PBSO), four men who were involved in this alleged courier stealing were caught by the police and they are part of a larger criminal conspiracy, reports Bocanewsnow.The defendants, Joseph Nunnally, Payton Brooker and Christopher Ventress have been charged with an organised scheme to defraud.Meanwhile, the fourth defendant, Fouad Saleh has been charged with grand theft, obtaining property by fraud, tampering with physical evidence, and dealing in stolen property. All four arrested UPS employees live in Palm Beach County Florida, US.As per multiple arrest reports filed by PBSO detectives, these men were involved in a scheme to intercept roughly $52,000 worth of iPhones and other Apple products in South Florida.The men allegedly created “ghost labels” while in a UPS facility in Palm Beach County that used addresses flagged by a UPS security system.UPS’ loss prevention system notified the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office which then intercepted the already stolen phones. Detectives placed trackers in the boxes which included several fake phones and then watched as the phones (along with the trackers) were delivered to an address in West Palm Beach.The people at the address then took the phones to Boost Mobile. It was unclear whether they then attempted to sell the phones to the retail store or have the phones activated to resell. While they were in Boost Mobile with the tracked phones, PBSO detectives moved in and took everyone into custody.
Article Summary: UPS allegedly used fake iPhones, AirPods, and other Apple products to seize its employees who were allegedly stealing from customers. According to the Palm Beach County Sheriff’s Office, four men who were involved in this alleged courier stealing were caught by the police and they are part of a larger criminal conspiracy.

Apple claims that these upgrades make the M3 models 60 percent faster than previous M1 laptops and 13 times faster than the fastest Intel-based MacBook Air.Exciting new features in the updated MacBook Air include support for up to two external displays even with the lid closed, Wi-Fi 6E compatibility, advanced voice isolation, wide spectrum microphone modes, and an impressive battery life of up to 18 hours on a single charge.The display retains the liquid retina panel with a resolution of 2560 x 1664 pixels and a peak brightness of 500 nits, delivering a vibrant and immersive viewing experience.

Article Title: Make money on Instagram through these 10 effective ways; check out now
Article Text:
Make money on Instagram in 2024

Brand partnerships

Earn from Instagram

Open an Instagram shop

Affiliate marketing

Drive traffic to your website

Offer marketing services

Sell creative works

Offer exclusive content

Dropshipping business

Create a feature account

Also read

In today's digital age, Instagram has emerged as a powerhouse social media platform with over one billion active monthly users worldwide. With such a vast and engaged audience, Instagram offers unparalleled opportunities for individuals to leverage their creativity and influence into profitable ventures. Whether you're seeking a supplementary income or aiming to transform Instagram into your primary source of revenue, monetizing your account can be both rewarding and lucrative.Here are 10 effective ways to kickstart your journey towards making money on Instagram.Instagram influencers collaborate with brands to promote products through various content formats such as posts, stories, and live streams. To attract brand partnerships, it's essential to build a substantial following and maintain a high engagement rate with your audience.Instagram incentivizes top creators by offering bonuses when they achieve specific milestones, such as reaching follower targets or achieving high engagement rates on their posts. This program encourages creators to consistently produce engaging content.Use Instagram as a platform to sell products by setting up an online shop. Create a dedicated business account to showcase your products, and leverage features like Instagram Shopping to facilitate seamless transactions directly through the app.Engage in affiliate marketing by partnering with brands to promote their products or services. You don't necessarily need a large following; instead, focus on building connections and leveraging your ability to engage customers and influencers to drive sales.Leverage Instagram to drive traffic to your website if you specialise in SEO or content marketing. Use Instagram stories and posts to share valuable content and promote your website, similar to how influencers endorse brands.If you excel in content creation, copywriting, or caption writing, leverage Instagram as a platform to offer marketing services to brands. Write compelling marketing content and captions for brands' Instagram posts to generate significant revenue.Monetize your creative talents by selling designs, photographs, or videos on Instagram. Showcase your creations to attract potential buyers and earn revenue through sales or commissioned projects.Provide exclusive content, such as courses or insider tips, to your followers for a fee. Exclusive content offerings can ensure a steady revenue stream and enhance your relationship with dedicated followers.Start a dropshipping business on Instagram without owning inventory. Source products from suppliers, set your prices, and engage with customers to facilitate sales. Leverage Instagram's reach to market your products effectively.Establish a niche-specific Instagram page with high engagement and followers. Offer other creators a platform to showcase their work on your page for a fee. For example, create a page dedicated to car and bike photography and charge creators to feature their content.
Article Summary: Instagram incentivizes top creators by offering bonuses when they achieve specific milestones, such as reaching follower targets or achieving high engagement rates on their posts. Use Instagram to drive traffic to your website if you specialise in SEO or content marketing. Establish a niche-specific Instagram page with high engagement and followers.

Article Title: Smart tips to reduce your summer electricity bill
Article Text:
Reduce electricity bills with smart tips

Purchase electrical appliances with a 5-star BEE rating

Switch to LED Lights

Transition to smart appliances for remote control and enhanced efficiency

Switch to BLDC fans

Utilise solar energy with solar panels

Set AC temperature at 24 degrees Celsius

Enable energy metering with smart Wi-Fi

Regularly servicing and maintaining home appliances to ensure peak performance

Utilise power strips for connecting multiple devices

Turn off electrical appliances when not in use

Alternative sources for reducing home electricity bills

Solar Energy: Solar power is a readily available and environmentally friendly energy source. You can choose solar water heating systems or photovoltaic solar panels. These can be installed on rooftops or in open areas to generate electricity for various household needs.

Wind Energy: Living in windy regions? Consider a small-scale wind turbine as an effective alternative energy source. These turbines harness wind power and convert it into electricity.

Biomass Energy: Biomass energy involves utilising organic materials such as wood pellets, agricultural waste, or animal waste to produce heat or electricity. Biomass stoves or boilers can efficiently provide heating or hot water while reducing reliance on conventional electricity sources.

Also read

During summer months, many households experience a significant increase in electricity consumption due to higher cooling needs. While staying comfortable during hot weather is essential, it doesn't have to come at the cost of soaring electricity bills. By implementing strategic energy-saving practices, you can reduce your summer electricity expenses without sacrificing comfort.Here you can explore several effective ways to save on summer electricity bills, offering practical tips and strategies that can help you minimise energy consumption and lower your utility costs during the warmer months.From optimising your cooling system to adopting energy-efficient habits, these recommendations are designed to make a noticeable impact on your electricity expenses while keeping your home cool and comfortable.Let's delve into these actionable tips that can help you save money and energy throughout the summer season.The Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE) issues BEE Star Labels as a voluntary method for manufacturers to indicate an appliance's energy efficiency. The label uses stars to indicate the efficiency of a product, with more stars indicating higher efficiency. Simply put, the higher the energy efficiency rating of the appliance, the lower its energy consumption. To effectively reduce your home's energy costs, opt for appliances with a 5-star BEE rating. Not only does this positively impact the environment, but it also helps lower your electricity bills. Explore Crompton's wide range of 5-star rated ceiling fans to learn more about BEE Rating Appliances.If your home still uses CFLs and incandescent bulbs, it's time to replace them with LED bulbs. LED bulbs are not just a trendy choice; they are recognized for their energy efficiency and superior illumination. If you're wondering how to reduce your electricity bill at home, switching to LED bulbs is the solution for you.Upgrading to smart appliances is a highly effective method to decrease electricity consumption at home. These devices allow you to automate tasks and manage energy usage efficiently. Consider installing energy-efficient ceiling fans to further reduce electricity consumption. Smart appliances typically come equipped with remote control capabilities, allowing you to schedule operations and conserve power. Crompton offers remote-controlled fans designed for enhanced energy savings and lower power consumption.These energy-efficient fans are gaining popularity due to their brushless direct current motors (BLDC), which operate on direct current electricity. They can help save up to 60% on electricity compared to normal induction motor-based fans. Additionally, they offer convenient features like remote control for turning the fan on and off, timer functionality, and compatibility with voice assistants. To learn more about the differences between BLDC fans and normal fans and how they can help reduce electricity bills, explore further information on BLDC fans versus conventional fans.Implementing a full solar power system for your home can be a substantial investment. However, there are more accessible and cost-effective ways to leverage solar energy. Installing outdoor solar lights in your balcony and garden, along with solar fans, can notably reduce your energy expenses at a modest cost. Additionally, using solar pumps for daily tasks can contribute to electricity savings. It's beneficial to understand the distinction between an electric geyser and a solar geyser to make an informed choice for your energy needs.Maintain your air conditioner at 24 degrees Celsius to optimise cooling and conserve energy during the summer months, effectively lowering electricity costs. Additionally, using a timer to automate AC operation and upgrading to a 5-star BEE-rated model can further enhance energy efficiency and reduce expenses associated with cooling your space.Numerous advanced smart energy metres are currently offered in the market. These metres typically use Wi-Fi connectivity to monitor overall power usage within a home and provide real-time analysis of consumption patterns. Additionally, they can detect power leaks and identify high-energy-consuming appliances. Wi-Fi LED bulbs represent an excellent choice for reducing electricity usage.Regularly servicing and maintaining your home appliances is essential for optimal functionality and efficiency. Appliances that are not properly maintained are known to consume excessive energy, so routine maintenance can prolong their lifespan and reduce energy consumption. Learn more about the importance of cleaning exhaust fans.Install a power strip if you have several electronic devices or appliances that need to be plugged into a single electrical outlet. This allows you to easily turn off all devices at once when they are not in use, preventing unnecessary energy consumption often referred to as "phantom" energy loss.One of the simplest and most effective methods to lower electricity costs is by turning off electrical devices such as lights, fans, and air conditioners when they are not in use.
Article Summary: During summer months, many households experience a significant increase in electricity consumption due to higher cooling needs. By implementing strategic energy-saving practices, you can reduce your summer electricity expenses without sacrificing comfort. From optimising your cooling system to adopting energy- efficient habits, these recommendations are designed to make a noticeable impact on your electricity expenses.
